title: Fix: Create new tick button has no icon and doesn't work
description:
The create new tick button:
1. Shows as blank blue square - no plus icon visible
2. Clicking it does nothing - create dialog doesn't open

The slot='prefix' fix was applied but icon still not showing. Need to investigate Shoelace icon loading.
closed_reason: Fixed: removed slot=prefix from icon-only button, wired up create dialog
